casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Willie James LANGLEY 221PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 30, 2018 John Keating Wiles, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Langley, Willie James. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of April 2018 by Defendant to Withdraw as Private Assigned Counsel and to Appoint the Appellate Defender:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of April 2018."
